alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:25PM EDT until August 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Putnam County in central Georgia... Central Jasper County in central Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 625 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Eudora to near Calvin to near McElheneys Crossroads, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Monticello, Shady Dale, Phoenix, Harmony, Oconee Springs Park, Warfield, Willard, Rockville, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Plant Harlee Branch, Calvin, Eudora, and Stanfordville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
